group_1.textCenter: Anyone with suggestions, please speak up!

group_1.textRight: Here!

group_1.textLeft: Go on, Tsumugi.

group_1.textRight: We should have everyone bring it themselves!

group_1.textLeft: Bring it themselves...? What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: On the night of the festival, we bring skewers@from home!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I see...bring your own...
However, wouldn't that make it difficult to@prepare in advance...?

group_1.textRight: Prepare in advance...?

group_1.textLeft: Please think back to last year's closing party.
Didn't the committee distribute the skewers?

group_1.textRight: Come to think of it, they were passing@them out...!
I tried to follow somebody, but they@ran away from me...

group_1.narration: "Preparing the skewers before the festival,@grilling them after it begins, and then@distributing them among the students...@This is the work of committee members."

group_1.textLeft: If the skewers are put together at the@grill, there won't be enough time.

group_1.textRight: I see...
It might be hard to prepare if everyone@brings it during the festival...

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps we could ask everyone to bring them@tomorrow and return them at the festival...?
But, if they break again...

group_1.textRight: Then how about having everyone skewer the@ingredients by themselves?
Everyone can choose their favorite ingredients,@doesn't that sound fun?

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmm.
It's like a buffet, right?

group_1.textRight: That's right! They're great, an@all-you-can-eat buffet!

group_1.textLeft: I've never been to one, but I've always wanted to...!
I heard they have all-you-can-eat cake...

group_1.textRight: I have a recommendation for a great all-you-can-eat cake place.

group_1.textLeft: Wow...!

group_1.textRight: I'm banned for eating too much, though...

group_1.textLeft: W-wow...
Um... This conversation is getting off track.

group_1.textRight: Ah...! I'm sorry!

group_1.textLeft: I apologize...

group_1.textCenter: I've been putting together a plan based on Tsumugi's idea...

group_1.narration: "This year, we're going to have a buffet-style party@where people can bring their own skewers and put whatever@they'd like on them."

"Sanitation, placement of skewers and grilling areas, and@making sure that no student misses out on the buffet...@It's different from previous years,@so we'll have more work to do...@but let's work together to get through this!"

group_1.textLeft: Tsumugi, I'm going to go talk to the teacher.
Can you figure out how to arrange things in the schoolyard?

group_1.textRight: Why me...?

group_1.textLeft: It was your idea, so I want to leave it to you.

group_1.textRight: If that's the case, I'll give it a try!

group_1.textLeft: You seem to get along well with her, Yukika and@Asuka, so please assist her.

group_1.textRight: Understood!

group_1.textLeft: Leave it to me!

group_1.textCenter: Everyone else, please continue to patrol.

group_1.textRight: Will there be any traffic jams with this arrangement?@Do you think any students would miss out on eating?

group_1.textLeft: ...I believe this arrangement will work.

group_1.textRight: Yaaay, it's done!
Yukika-senpai, you're really good at this kind of thing.

group_1.textLeft: I'm used to it from student council work.
I'm done over here too!
This is the last of the broken skewers and boxes.

group_1.textRight: Sorry you had to clean up...

group_1.textLeft: Please don't worry about it.
Moving around suits me better than using my@head...!
By the way, these...
I found these among the broken skewers...

group_1.textRight: Seeds...? They're big...

group_1.textLeft: Did they come with these boxes?

group_1.textRight: Hmm... That doesn't seem very likely...
Maybe the culprit used them to rig the skewers to break?

group_1.textLeft: I see! How did they pull that off?!

group_1.textRight: Sorry... I don't know the exact method.
But ruining only the skewers is a really roundabout@way of causing trouble...

group_1.textLeft: Many of the other troubles are similar...
I'm not even sure what their intentions are in@causing all this trouble...

group_1.textRight: Are they randomly doing whatever they can?

group_1.textLeft: There's also the possibility of multiple culprits@committing disorganized crimes...!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I'm a little confused...
I'll deliver these seeds to the chairperson later.

group_1.textLeft: Please take care of it.

group_1.textRight: Now that we're done here, let's get back to our@rounds.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Helping those in need is what the committee is@all about!

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's right... Manaka might be waiting for me!
We have to meet up!
